review: Cool technology. Works as it claims. Easy 5-min set-up. But the service still seems to be in beta stage. After weeks of usage, I found that connecting my Mac directly to my TV through HDMI cable actually works better. The streaming to the Chromecast took a lot of bandwidth I feel. Sometimes the connection or sync did not work after the TV was off and turned back on. However, I am looking forward to its future development.
author: Andrew H
